UniprotID	O95936-2
Accession	O95936;B7Z4I2;B7ZA51;G3XAI5;Q8TAZ2;Q9UPM7
EntryName	EOMES_HUMAN
ProteinName	Eomesodermin homolog (T-box brain protein 2) (T-brain-2) (TBR-2)
GeneName	EOMES TBR2
Length	419
Function	Functions as a transcriptional activator playing a crucial role during development. Functions in trophoblast differentiation and later in gastrulation, regulating both mesoderm delamination and endoderm specification. Plays a role in brain development being required for the specification and the proliferation of the intermediate progenitor cells and their progeny in the cerebral cortex (PubMed:17353897). Required for differentiation and migration of unipolar dendritic brush cells (PubMed:33488348). Also involved in the differentiation of CD8+ T-cells during immune response regulating the expression of lytic effector genes (PubMed:17566017).
Subcellular Location	Nucleus
Disorder	
ExposeBuried	
SurfaceAccessbility	
SecondStructure	
Hydropathy	
Polar	
Charge

pNuLoCRegion	9...24;63...69;124...129;374...390
